mapper.select: SELECT e.EMP_NUMBER, e.EMP_NAME, e.EMP_AGE, e.EMP_GENDER, e.EMP_PHONE, e.EMP_EMAIL, e.EMP_DATE, e.EMP_CONTENT, ei.EMP_IMG_NUMBER, ei.EMP_IMG_NAME, ei.EMP_IMG_UPLOAD_PATH, ei.EMP_IMG_UUID FROM EMP e LEFT JOIN EMP_IMG ei on e.EMP_NUMBER = ei.EMP_NUMBER WHERE e.EMP_NUMBER = ${empNumber}

SELECT * FROM SITTER_BOARD
WHERE EMP_NUMBER = ${empNumber} AND ROWNUM <= 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMP WHERE EMP_GENDER = 'F'
SELECT avg(RATING) avg, e.EMP_NUMBER FROM EMP e JOIN SITTER_BOARD s ON e.EMP_NUMBER = s.EMP_NUMBER WHERE e.EMP_NUMBER = ${empNumber} group by e.EMP_NUMBER

select ai.ACT_IMG_NUMBER, ai.ACT_NUMBER, ai.ACT_IMG_NAME, ai.ACT_IMG_UPLOAD_PATH, ai.ACT_IMG_UUID, a.ACT_NAME from act a JOIN ACT_IMG ai on a.ACT_NUMBER = ai.ACT_NUMBER where ai.ACT_NUMBER IN ( select ACT_NUMBER from EMP_ACT_ITEM where EMP_NUMBER = ${empNumber} )
SELECT * FROM EMP e LEFT JOIN EMP_ACT_ITEM eai ON e.EMP_NUMBER = eai.EMP_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ACT_IMG ai ON eai.ACT_NUMBER = ai.ACT_NUMBER LEFT JOIN ACT a ON eai.ACT_NUMBER = a.ACT_NUMBER
